title: My Hero Academia Season 1
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 1 Boku no Hero Academia 僕のヒーローアカデミア MHA Season 1 Boku no Hero Academia S1
description: In a world where 80% of humanity possesses 'Quirks,' Izuku Midoriya is born powerless but gains a chance to become a hero after a fated meeting with All Might.

title: My Hero Academia Season 2
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 2nd Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 2 Boku no Hero Academia 2nd Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 2nd Season MHA Season 2
description: The UA students compete in the world-renowned Sports Festival. Later, Deku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against the fearsome Hero Killer: Stain.

title: My Hero Academia Season 3
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 3rd Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 3 Boku no Hero Academia 3rd Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 3rd Season MHA Season 3
description: During a summer training camp, the League of Villains launches a surprise attack. This leads to the historic final battle between All Might and All For One.

title: My Hero Academia Season 4
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 4th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 4 Boku no Hero Academia 4th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 4th Season MHA Season 4
description: Deku takes on an internship with Sir Nighteye and joins a mission to rescue a young girl named Eri from the Yakuza leader, Overhaul.

title: My Hero Academia Season 5
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 5th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 5 Boku no Hero Academia 5th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 5th Season MHA Season 5
description: Class 1-A and Class 1-B battle in a joint training exercise. Meanwhile, the League of Villains faces off against the Meta Liberation Army.

title: My Hero Academia Season 6
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 6th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 6 Boku no Hero Academia 6th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 6th Season MHA Season 6
description: The Paranormal Liberation War begins. Heroes and Villains engage in an all-out war that will change hero society forever.

title: My Hero Academia Season 7
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 7th Season
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Season 7 Boku no Hero Academia 7th Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア 7th Season MHA Season 7
description: The final war between Heroes and Villains begins as Star and Stripe arrives from the USA to face Shigaraki.

title: My Hero Academia Final Season
originalTitle: Boku no Hero Academia Final Season
japaneseTitle: 僕のヒーローアカデミア FINAL SEASON
searchableTitle: My Hero Academia Final Season Boku no Hero Academia Final Season 僕のヒーローアカデミア FINAL SEASON MHA Final Season
description: The appearance of 'quirks,' newly discovered superpowers, has been steadily increasing over the years, with 80 percent of humanity possessing various abilities from manipulation of elements to shapeshifting. This leaves the remainder of the world completely powerless, and Izuku Midoriya is one such individual.

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
searchableTitle: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Fantastic Four 2025 FF 2025
description: Marvel's First Family enters the MCU. Set in a retro-futuristic 1960s, the team must balance their new powers with a cosmic threat that could destroy the universe.

title: Jurassic World Rebirth
searchableTitle: Jurassic World Rebirth Jurassic World 4 JW Rebirth
description: A new era of the Jurassic franchise begins. Five years after the events of Dominion, a specialized team races to secure DNA samples from the world's most dangerous dinosaurs before they fall into the wrong hands.

title: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir
searchableTitle: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir Harry Potter Prequel Tom Riddle Origins
description: While initially a fan project, HBO's upcoming Harry Potter reboot series has sparked renewed interest in the origins of Tom Riddle. This entry tracks the anticipated 2026 window for the Wizarding World's return with a focus on young Tom Riddle's transformation into Lord Voldemort.

title: Superman
searchableTitle: Superman Superman: Legacy Superman (2025)
description: Directed by James Gunn, this film follows Clark Kent as he reconciles his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing in Smallville, Kansas. He is the embodiment of truth, justice, and a better tomorrow in a world that views kindness as old-fashioned.

title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two
originalTitle: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two
searchableTitle: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two Mission: Impossible 8 MI8
description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet to track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity before it falls into the wrong hands.

episodes.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two

title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
originalTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
searchableTitle: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish Puss in Boots 2 The Last Wish
description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

episodes.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish

title: Top Gun: Maverick
searchableTitle: Top Gun: Maverick Top Gun 2 Top Gun Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

title: Attack on Titan
japaneseTitle: 進撃の巨人
searchableTitle: Attack on Titan Shingeki no Kyojin 進撃の巨人 AOT The Advancing Giant SnK
description: Centuries ago, mankind was slaughtered to near extinction by monstrous humanoid creatures called Titans. Humanity survives within three massive walls. After a Colossal Titan breaches the outer wall, young Eren Jaeger vows to exterminate every Titan.

episodes.title: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
episodes.description: Eren Yeager lives in the town of Shiganshina, located within the outermost of three circular walls protecting humanity from Titans.

episodes.title: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
episodes.description: Eren watches in horror as his mother is eaten by a Titan. He vows to kill all Titans.

episodes.title: A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
episodes.description: Five years after the fall of Wall Maria, Eren, Mikasa, and Armin graduate from the Training Corps.

episodes.title: Beast Titan
episodes.description: The Scout Regiment discovers a new type of Titan and deals with the aftermath of the battle of Trost District.

episodes.title: I'm Home
episodes.description: The Scouts return to the destroyed Shiganshina district, and Eren confronts his past.

episodes.title: Warrior
episodes.description: Reiner reveals his true identity as the Armored Titan to Eren.

episodes.title: Smoke Signal
episodes.description: The Scout Regiment faces a conspiracy within the walls as the Central Military Police targets Historia.

episodes.title: Pain
episodes.description: Erwin is captured by the Military Police, and Levi's squad plans a rescue mission.

episodes.title: Old Story
episodes.description: Kenny Ackerman's backstory is revealed as the battle for the Reiss family continues.

episodes.title: The Other Side of the Ocean
episodes.description: The story shifts to Marley, revealing Reiner's life and the Warrior candidates.

episodes.title: Midnight Train
episodes.description: Reiner and Zeke return to Liberio, and the War Hammer Titan is introduced.

episodes.title: The Door of Hope
episodes.description: Eren infiltrates Marley as a wounded soldier and meets a young boy named Falco.

episodes.title: Judgement
episodes.description: The battle in Liberio continues as Eren faces the War Hammer Titan.

episodes.title: Sneak Attack
episodes.description: The Scouts launch an attack on the Marleyan military during the festival.

episodes.title: Two Brothers
episodes.description: Eren and Zeke reunite in Paths, revealing their plan to use the Founding Titan's power.

episodes.title: The Rumbling
episodes.description: Eren initiates the Rumbling, unleashing thousands of Colossal Titans to flatten the world outside Paradis.

episodes.title: The Last Attack
episodes.description: The final battle to stop Eren's Rumbling reaches its climax as the remaining Scouts make their last stand.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Season 1
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Season 1 Kimetsu no Yaiba 鬼滅の刃 Blade of Demon Destruction Guardian of the Night
description: After a demon attack leaves his family slaughtered and his sister Nezuko transformed into a demon, young Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to find a cure and hunt down the progenitor of all demons, Muzan Kibutsuji.

episodes.title: Cruelty
episodes.description: Tanjiro returns home to find his family slaughtered by demons, with only his sister Nezuko surviving but transformed into a demon.

episodes.title: Trainer Sakonji Urokodaki
episodes.description: Tanjiro meets Sakonji Urokodaki, a former Hashira who agrees to train him to become a Demon Slayer.

episodes.title: Sabito and Makomo
episodes.description: During his training, Tanjiro encounters Sabito and Makomo, two spirits who help him master the sword techniques.

title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
originalTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編 Demon Slayer Movie 1 Mugen Train Arc
description: Tanjiro, Nezuko, Zenitsu, and Inosuke board the Mugen Train to assist the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, in investigating a series of disappearances.

episodes.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
episodes.description: The Demon Slayer Corps faces Enmu, Lower Rank One of the Twelve Kizuki, aboard a mysterious train where passengers are falling into eternal sleep.

title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train Arc (TV Version)
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train Arc (TV Version) Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-hen 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編 Season 2 Part 1 Mugen Train TV Arc
description: The TV version of the Mugen Train movie, expanded with additional scenes and an original first episode focusing on Rengoku's mission.

episodes.title: Flame Hashira Kyojuro Rengoku
episodes.description: A special episode focusing on Rengoku's mission before boarding the Mugen Train, with additional character development.

title: Demon Slayer: Entertainment District Arc
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 遊郭編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Entertainment District Arc Kimetsu no Yaiba: Yuukaku-hen 鬼滅の刃 遊郭編 Season 2 Part 2 Red Light District Arc
description: Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke join the Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, on a mission to an entertainment district where women have been disappearing.

episodes.title: Sound Hashira Tengen Uzui
episodes.description: Tengen Uzui recruits Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke for a mission in the Entertainment District to investigate demon activity.

episodes.title: Infiltration
episodes.description: The Demon Slayers go undercover in the Entertainment District to gather information about the disappearances.

title: Demon Slayer: Swordsmith Village Arc
originalTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 刀鍛冶の里編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Swordsmith Village Arc Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen 鬼滅の刃 刀鍛冶の里編 Season 3 Swordsmith Village
description: Tanjiro travels to the hidden Swordsmith Village to repair his broken sword, where he encounters the Love Hashira and Mist Hashira while facing Upper Rank demons.

episodes.title: Someone's Dream
episodes.description: Tanjiro arrives at the Swordsmith Village and meets the Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji and Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito.

episodes.title: Yoriichi Type Zero
episodes.description: Tanjiro discovers an ancient training doll with six arms, leading to revelations about Sun Breathing techniques.

title: Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc
japaneseTitle: 鬼滅の刃 柱稽古編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Hashira Training Arc Kimetsu no Yaiba: Hashira Geiko-hen 鬼滅の刃 柱稽古編 Season 4 Hashira Training
description: Following the intense battle in the Swordsmith Village, the Demon Slayer Corps undergoes rigorous training with the Hashira to prepare for the final confrontation with Muzan Kibutsuji.

episodes.title: To Defeat Muzan Kibutsuji
episodes.description: Tanjiro begins his training with the Stone Hashira, Gyomei Himejima, as all Demon Slayers prepare for the final battle.

episodes.title: Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji
episodes.description: Tanjiro trains with the Love Hashira to improve his flexibility and agility for the upcoming battles.

title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle - Part 1
originalTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Jou-hen Part 1
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限城編 前編
searchableTitle: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle - Part 1 Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Jou-hen Part 1 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限城編 前編 Infinity Castle Movie 1 Akaza Returns
description: The first film in the epic finale trilogy. The Demon Slayer Corps enters the Infinity Castle to face the remaining deadly Twelve Kizuki, beginning with Upper Rank Three Akaza.

episodes.title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle - Part 1
episodes.description: The Demon Slayer Corps enters Muzan's Infinity Castle for their final confrontation. Tanjiro faces Akaza in a rematch while other Hashira battle the remaining Upper Ranks.

title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇
searchableTitle: Chainsaw Man Reze Arc Movie 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇 Bomb Girl
description: A direct sequel to the first season covering the 'Bomb Girl' arc. Denji's life is upended when he meets Reze, a mysterious girl who works at a café, unaware that she is the Bomb Devil, a Soviet hybrid sent to steal his heart[citation:1][citation:4].

episodes.title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
episodes.description: Denji falls for the enigmatic Reze, not knowing she is a lethal hybrid assassin. Their relationship triggers a catastrophic battle involving the Typhoon Devil and forces Denji to question trust and desire[citation:1].

description: In a town where the delinquent-heavy Chidori High and the elite Kikyo Girls' High are bitter rivals, Rintaro Tsumugi, a misunderstood student with a fierce face but a gentle heart, meets Kaoruko Waguri. As they grow closer, they must navigate the deep-seated prejudices and social barriers between their two schools.

title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
japaneseTitle: 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇
searchableTitle: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc Gekijō-ban Chensō Man Reze-hen 劇場版 チェンソーマン レゼ篇 Reze Arc
description: A direct sequel to the first season, the film follows Denji as he navigates his life as a hybrid devil hunter. His peaceful days are interrupted when he meets Reze, a mysterious girl working at a local cafe. What starts as a budding romance quickly spirals into a high-stakes battle as Reze's true identity as the Bomb Devil is revealed, leading to an explosive confrontation that tests Denji's heart and resolve.

title: Landman
japaneseTitle: ランドマン
searchableTitle: Landman Taylor Sheridan Billy Bob Thornton Sam Elliott 2024 2025
description: Set in the boomtowns of West Texas, Landman is a modern-day tale of fortune-seeking in the world of oil rigs. Based on the podcast 'Boomtown,' the series follows Tommy Norris, a crisis executive for an oil company, as he navigates the high-stakes industry where billionaires and roughnecks collide in a quest for wealth and power.

title: Landman Season 2
japaneseTitle: ランドマン シーズン2
searchableTitle: Landman Season 2 Taylor Sheridan Billy Bob Thornton Sam Elliott 2025
description: The saga continues in West Texas as Tommy Norris steps into the role of CEO following the dramatic fallout of the first season. With corporate stakes higher than ever and Sam Elliott joining as Tommy's father, the family must navigate new betrayals and explosive confrontations as they attempt to hold onto their oil empire in an increasingly ruthless landscape.

title: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
originalTitle: Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
japaneseTitle: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん
searchableTitle: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san Roshidere
description: Alisa Mikhailovna Kujou, known as Alya, is the beautiful and talented 'Ice Princess' of Seirei Academy. She often scolds her deskmate Masachika Kuze, but secretly flirts with him in Russian, believing he doesn't understand. Unbeknownst to her, Masachika is actually fluent in Russian and understands every word of her affectionate confessions.

episodes.title: Alya Hides Her Feelings in Russian
A Kiss of the Indirect Variety
Rom-commy With a Chance of Hypnosis

title: Noor
japaneseTitle: ヌール
searchableTitle: Noor 2025 Arifin Shuvoo Jannatul Ferdous Oishee Raihan Rafi Bioscope+
description: Noor falls deeply in love with Shuili, but his intense devotion slowly turns into an unhealthy obsession. As his temper and insecurities grow, their once beautiful marriage begins to unravel. When Shuili leaves, Noor's life spirals out of control, leading him to a path of redemption and confronting memories of a love that nearly destroyed them both.

title: Call of the Night
japaneseTitle: よふかしのうた
searchableTitle: Call of the Night Season 1 Yofukashi no Uta 2022 Ko Yamori Nazuna Nanakusa
description: Ko Yamori, a middle schooler suffering from insomnia, wanders the city streets at night. His life changes when he meets Nazuna Nanakusa, a flirtatious vampire who shows him the freedom of the night. To become a vampire himself, Ko must fall in love with her, beginning a nocturnal journey of self-discovery.

The season delves into the dark history of vampires and Nazuna's forgotten human past, culminating in the 'Cigarette Case' arc.

title: Sanda
japaneseTitle: SANDA
searchableTitle: Sanda SANDA サンダー Santa Claus
description: In a future where the birthrate is dwindling, Sanda, a normal middle school boy, discovers he is the descendant of Santa Claus. He must navigate a strange world and even stranger powers when his classmate tries to kill him to awaken his true form.

title: To Your Eternity Season 3
japaneseTitle: 不滅のあなたへ Season 3
searchableTitle: To Your Eternity Season 3 Fumetsu no Anata e Season 3 不滅のあなたへ Fushi
description: Fushi enters the 'This World' arc. After centuries of struggle, the immortal entity finds himself in a modern era where the Nokkers have taken a different, more subtle approach to infiltration. Fushi must navigate a world of technology and peace while protecting his revived friends.

description: Mukoda, Fel, and Sui continue their leisurely journey across the kingdom. With new deities demanding offerings and even more exotic ingredients to cook, Mukoda's online supermarket remains the most overpowered skill in the land.

title: Infinite Gacha
originalTitle: Shinjiteita Nakama-tachi ni Dungeon Okuchi de Korosarekaketa ga Gift 'Mugen Gacha' de Level 9999 no Nakama-tachi wo Te ni Irete Moto Party Member to Sekai ni Fukushuu & 'Zamaa!' Shimasu!
japaneseTitle: 信じていた仲間達にダンジョン奥地で殺されかけたがギフト『無限ガチャ』でレベル9999の仲間達を手に入れて元パーティメンバーと世界に復讐＆『ざまぁ！』します！
searchableTitle: Infinite Gacha Mugen Gacha Shinjiteita Nakama-tachi ni Dungeon

searchableTitle: Ranma 1/2 2024 2nd Season らんま1/2 MAPPA
description: The martial arts mayhem continues as Ranma Saotome and Akane Tendo deal with more rivals, more curses, and the ever-present chaos of their arranged engagement. New characters from the classic manga are introduced in this high-fidelity remake.

seasons.title: May I Ask for One Final Thing?
seasons.originalTitle: Saigo ni Hitotsu dake Onegai Shitemo Yoroshī Deshō ka

seasons.searchableTitle: May I Ask for One Final Thing? Saigo ni Hitotsu dake Onegai shitemo Yoroshii deshou ka Saigo ni Hitotsu dake Onegai Shite mo Yoroshii Deshou ka Saihito 最後にひとつだけお願いしてもよろしいでしょうか The Mad Dog Duchess
seasons.description: At a formal ball, Scarlet, a noblewoman of a ducal family, is publicly humiliated when her fiancé, Second Prince Kyle, abruptly annuls their engagement. Falsely accused of bullying the Prince's favorite, Scarlet decides she has had enough of the idiocy. She asks for one final favor: to give the arrogant prince a good fist in the face. Thus begins the story of an elegant yet rebellious fighter who deals with her problems with bare-knuckle justice.

episodes.title: A Dance of Blood and Lace
A Dance of Blood and Lace
The True Identity of the Villainess

seasons.japaneseTitle: デッド・アカウント
seasons.searchableTitle: Dead Account デッド・アカウント
seasons.description: The online streamer Aoringo is a troll, making the worst of the worst of boundary-pushing flamebait content and raking in the revenue from the hate-watchers. Always ready for a fight! Destruction for destruction's sake! [[9]]

episodes.title: The Man is the Flamboyant Type

seasons.description: Next to Miyu Suzuki, a trendy and bubbly high school girl, sits Yuusuke Tani, a quiet and frank boy. Their interactions are brief but their personalities are polar opposites.

seasons.description: Every time Yoi Takiguchi so much as lets out a sigh, her female classmates squeal in admiration and awe. She has been dubbed the school's prince.

seasons.title: Roll over and Die
seasons.originalTitle: Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omouna to Yuusha Party wo Oida Reta no de, Kozukuri Na Saikyou Shuzoku to Mahou Ken Wo Te Ni Irete Futsuu Ni Ikinobiru Koto Ni Shita
seasons.japaneseTitle: お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うなと勇者パーティーを追放されたので、こじくりな最強種族と魔法剣を手に入れて普通に生き延びることにした
synonyms: Roll Over and Die: I Will Fight for an Ordinary Life with My Love and Cursed Sword!
seasons.searchableTitle: Roll over and Die Omae Gotoki ga Maou ni Kateru to Omouna to Yuusha Party wo Oida Reta no de, Kozukuri Na Saikyou Shuzoku to Mahou Ken Wo Te Ni Irete Futsuu Ni Ikinobiru Koto Ni Shita お前ごときが魔王に勝てると思うなと勇者パーティーを追放されたので、こじくりな最強種族と魔法剣を手に入れて普通に生き延びることにした
seasons.description: Flum has been chosen by God to be in the hero's party despite having stats of zero across the board. All she has is the 'Reversal' ability.

seasons.title: A Gentle Noble's Vacation Recommendation
seasons.originalTitle: Odayaka Kizoku no Kyuuka no Susume
seasons.japaneseTitle: おだやか貴族の休暇のススメ
synonyms: Odayaka Kizoku no Kyuuka no Susume
seasons.searchableTitle: A Gentle Noble's Vacation Recommendation Odayaka Kizoku no Kyuuka no Susume おだやか貴族の休暇のススメ
seasons.description: When Lizel mysteriously finds himself in a city that bears odd similarities to his own but clearly isn't, he quickly comes to terms with the unlikely truth and decides to enjoy a vacation.

seasons.title: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife
seasons.originalTitle: Toumei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fuufu ni Naru Futari
seasons.japaneseTitle: 透明男と人間女 そのうち夫婦になる二人
synonyms: Toumei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fuufu ni Naru Futari
seasons.searchableTitle: The Invisible Man and His Soon-to-Be Wife Toumei Otoko to Ningen Onna: Sonouchi Fuufu ni Naru Futari 透明男と人間女 そのうち夫婦になる二人
seasons.description: Akira Tounome is an invisible gentleman who runs a detective agency, and Shizuka Yakou is a mild-mannered blind woman who works there. This manga is a super heartwarming urban fantasy office romance.

seasons.title: The Holy Grail of Eris
seasons.japaneseTitle: エリスの聖杯
seasons.searchableTitle: The Holy Grail of Eris Eris no Seihai エリスの聖杯
seasons.description: As a viscount's daughter, Constance Grail is an ordinary girl whose only notable trait is sincerity, leaving her with no real options when someone steals her family's heirloom, the Holy Grail of Eris.

seasons.title: Chained Soldier Season 1
seasons.japaneseTitle: 魔都精兵の奴隷
seasons.searchableTitle: Chained Soldier Season 1 Mato Seihei no Slave 魔都精兵の奴隷
seasons.description: After his high school graduation, Yuuki Wakura realizes it has been five years since his sister's disappearance during a Mato disaster. One day, he gets lost at the entrance of a demon city and becomes the 'slave' of a superpowered squad of women.

seasons.title: Chained Soldier Season 2
seasons.japaneseTitle: 魔都精兵の奴隷 2
seasons.searchableTitle: Chained Soldier Season 2 Mato Seihei no Slave 2 魔都精兵の奴隷 2
seasons.description: The second season of Chained Soldier continues the story of Yuuki Wakura and the Mato Seihei.

seasons.title: An Adventurer's Daily Grind at Age 29
seasons.japaneseTitle: 29歳独身中堅冒険者の日常
seasons.searchableTitle: An Adventurer's Daily Grind at Age 29 29-sai Dokushin Chuuken Boukensha no Nichijou 29歳独身中堅冒険者の日常
seasons.description: This story is about Shinonome Hajime, an adventurer of Silver Range. He's dedicated to fulfilling missions from the guild. One day, while dungeon-diving for work, he encounters a starving girl named Rirui.

seasons.title: Fate/strange Fake
seasons.japaneseTitle: フェイト/ストレンジフェイク
seasons.searchableTitle: Fate/strange Fake FSF Fate Series Snowfield Holy Grail War
seasons.description: In the American city of Snowfield, a false Holy Grail War begins, faultily copied from the Third Holy Grail War in Fuyuki. This irregular ritual summons strange Servants and lacks a standard Saber class, drawing the attention of the Mage's Association and various factions into a twisted conflict where the definition of a 'hero' is blurred.
